Lord of the Rings extended edition DVD set

Posted by darrellnorton on December 29, 2004

Last night I peeled the shrink wrap off one of my most highly anticipated Christmas gifts, The Lord of the Rings extended DVD collection. I only got to watch The Fellowship of the Ring, which took long enough considering the extra half-hour of film. I liked the added and extended scenes since they made the movie more continuous, although I can see why they were cut from the movie for time reasons. And I didn’t even take a look at the 2 extra DVDs, From Book to Vision and From Vision to Reality. Or the commentary included on the 2 movie DVDs. Sheesh! All I can say is it rocks!


I’m looking forward to the extra 43 minutes in The Two Towers and 50 minutes in The Return of the King!
